## to_iso639

## Description
Convert to and from ISO 639 language code


## Usage
```r

to_iso639(lang, silent = TRUE)

from_iso639(iso)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| lang | Name of the language to be converted |
| silent | Flag to indicate if the function should return a message with the result. If there is no match, it will be an error message |
| iso | The two-letter ISO 639 code to search |
